sentences.english: Daqu spent grains and wheat bran were used as main raw materials to produce feed xylanase.
sentences.chinese: 以大麴丟糟和麥麩爲主要原料生產飼用木聚糖酶。

sentences.english: Wheat bran and cabbage help maintain estrogen at healthy levels.
sentences.chinese: 麥麩和圓白菜可幫助維護女性荷爾蒙在健康級別。

sentences.english: Objective To explore the effects of different preparative products of wheat bran on invigorating spleen.
sentences.chinese: 目的觀察麥麩的健脾功效及不同炒製程度對其影響。

sentences.english: Sodium hydroxide was used to release ferulic acid from wheat bran in the paper.
sentences.chinese: 該文研究以麥麩爲原料製備阿魏酸技術路線。

sentences.english: However, biopsy findings were compatible with gluten-sensitive enteropathy in all seven patients.
sentences.chinese: 而活檢則發現全部7名患者都符合麥麩敏感性腸病。

sentences.english: How much more tofu and oat bran would it take to make a difference?
sentences.chinese: 那麼，喫多少豆腐和燕麥麩纔算有意義呢？

sentences.english: High-fiber foods include beans, nuts, bran, and vegetables.
sentences.chinese: 高纖維的食物包括豆子，堅果，麥麩，水果。

sentences.english: A gluten-free diet was recommended for patients with gluten-sensitive enteropathy.
sentences.chinese: 患此病患者建議食用不含麥麩的飲食。

sentences.english: The wheat bran without aleurone is still a good animal diet.
sentences.chinese: 去小麥糊粉小麥麩仍可作爲動物飼料使用。

sentences.english: Oat bran was porphyrizd into cell-level ultramicro-power.
sentences.chinese: 對燕麥麩進行細胞級超微細粉碎。

definition: please excuse me for not complying/to politely decline
